title: Start
body:
<<run mana = 20>>
<<run loops=1>>
You see a wizard.
[[Greet him|Greet]]

title: Spells
body:
player: You are a wizard. Can you cast a spell?
wizard: <<if mana < 0>>I'm out of mana!<<else>><<if loops > 5 >>Again? Am I a joke to you?
 Ok, fine.
<<else>>Indeed I am. <<endif>>What do you need?[[Ask about fireballs|Fire]]
[[Ask about lightning|Flash]]
[[Nothing in particular|Back]]<<endif>> <<run loops +=1>>

title: Back
body:
player: No spell in particular comes to mind. I was just asking...
wizard: Then yes, I CAN cast a spell.
[[bye|Bye]]

title: Bye
body:
player: Farewell!
wizard: <<if loops>5>>Good riddance!<<else>>Safe travels!<<endif>>

[[come back|Spells]]

title: Greet
body:
wizard: Greetings, Traveller!
player: Well met!
[[Ask about wizardry|Spells]]

title: Flash
body:
player: Lightning Please!
wizard: ...

*Zap!*
<<run mana-=3>>[[More!|Spells]]
[[I've had enough.|Bye]]

title: Fire
body:
player: A Fireball Please
*wizard concentrates*

*BOOM!*
<<run mana-=5>>[[That was impressive! More!|Spells]]
[[I've had enough.|Bye]]
